items.question: What types of videos work best with the highlight detector?
items.answer: Our tool is optimized for all types of video content, including social media clips, vlogs, webinars, and more. It performs best with clear audio and visual cues to identify highlights effectively.

items.question: Can I set specific criteria for highlights?
items.answer: Absolutely! You can define parameters such as 'most engaging moments', 'key quotes', or 'action-packed scenes' to tailor highlight detection to your content's needs.

items.question: How long does the highlight detection process take?
items.answer: Detection is incredibly fast, typically taking just a couple of minutes depending on video length. Enjoy efficient turnaround no matter how big or small the project.

items.question: What formats can I upload?
items.answer: We support a wide range of video formats including MP4, AVI, and MOV for seamless processing. Ensure your videos are adequately compressed for optimal performance.

items.question: Are the highlights I receive ready for use?
items.answer: Yes! The highlights extracted are fully editable and ready for immediate sharing or integration into other projects.

items.question: Do I need editing software to refine the highlights?
items.answer: While the highlights are ready to use, you can further enhance them with your preferred editing software if desired.

items.question: How often is the highlight detection model updated?
items.answer: Our AI models are continuously improved based on user feedback and ongoing research to ensure optimal performance and accuracy.

items.question: Is there support available if I run into issues?
items.answer: Yes! We offer comprehensive support through documentation, tutorials, and a dedicated support team to assist you with any questions or challenges.

items.question: What is the pricing structure for using the highlight detector?
items.answer: We operate on a flexible pay-as-you-go model with no monthly fees. Costs are based on the video length and complexity of the highlight detection process.

items.question: Can I use the highlights commercially?
items.answer: Absolutely! All highlights produced through our platform come with full commercial rights, allowing you to use them in promotions, ads, and any other commercial endeavors.

items.question: Is there a limit to the number of videos I can process?
items.answer: No, you can process as many videos as you need without limits. Enjoy our robust infrastructure designed to handle multiple video uploads efficiently.
